title: Kneipp Arnica Herbal Bath Oil for Joint & Muscles, Bath Soak, 3.38 fl. oz. Joint & Muscle, Amica
description: Kneipp Arnica Herbal Bath Oil for Joint & Muscles, Bath Soak, 3.38 fl. oz. Joint & Muscle, Amica
cleaned_text: Pure & Effective Bath Oil to Soothe Muscles & Joints Pine Oil, Rosemary, Eucalyptus, and Arnica oils deliver a simultaneously warming and cooling effect on the body while uplifting Orange Peel oil helps boost your spirits. Add one capful of this herbal bath oil to warm running water to create comforting, restorative soak. Whether you are running a marathon or chasing your toddler, it's Kneipp Joint & Muscle Bath Oil to the rescue. Try combining with the Kneipp Joint & Muscle Mineral Bath Salt for a one-two punch, when you don't want your first day back to the gym to be your last.
